doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
doomsayer.description: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

angel.name: Angel
angel.description: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.

buddhist.name: Buddhist
buddhist.description: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.

hellslibrarian.name: Hell's Librarian
hellslibrarian.description: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.

revolutionary.name: Revolutionary
revolutionary.description: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.

fiddler.name: Fiddler
fiddler.description: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.

toymaker.name: Toymaker
toymaker.description: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.

fibbin.name: Fibbin
fibbin.description: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

duchess.name: Duchess
duchess.description: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.description: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

spiritofivory.name: Spirit of Ivory
spiritofivory.description: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

djinn.name: Djinn
djinn.description: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

bootlegger.name: Bootlegger
bootlegger.description: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

gardener.name: Gardener
gardener.description: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.
